# Robert Eber

![](https://www.cherryhillsvillage.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4694)

## Robert Eber

### District 6

Phone: 303-810-0914

Current Term: 2023 to 2027

[Email: reber@cherryhillsvillage.com](mailto:reber@cherryhillsvillage.com)

### Village Center
